author: wn.com
title: Prescription Drug Labels (9-29-2014) (GDNA - Georgia Drugs and Narcotics Agency)
text: ( Source : GDNA - Georgia Drugs and Narcotics Agency ) In response to numerous inquiries about the proper labeling of prescriptions drugs, the Georgia State Board of Pharmacy has examined the issue in light of state law. O.C. G.A. Section
